org.sakaiproject.content.api

Interface ContentFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HtmlPageFilter

    public interface ContentFilter
    Interface that allows modification of some content. We don't have access to the response headers so can't do things like zip compression.
    Author:
    buckett

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isFiltered(ContentResource resource)
      Check if this content filter should be applied to the resource.
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse wrap(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, ContentResource resource)
      Create a filter which will process the content.

    • Method Detail

      • isFiltered

        boolean isFiltered(ContentResource resource)
        Check if this content filter should be applied to the resource. This should be a fast check.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource being requested.
        Returns:
        true if a filter should be retrieved using #wrap(OutputStream).

      • wrap

        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse wrap(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                          ContentResource resource)
        Create a filter which will process the content.
        Parameters:
        content - A stream to which the output will be written.
        Returns:
        An output stream which is contains the modified output.
